data.title: Software Developer - TCS
data.description: Built the Advocate Portal to speed up insurance claim data collection, reducing processing time and improving customer satisfaction by 15%; enhanced database efficiency by 20% and reduced errors by 15%; optimized file uploads to save 40% of users' form-fill time; processed uploaded files with validations and optimizations for seamless uploads and downloads; automated tasks using SQL stored procedures across multiple tables; developed with Spring Boot, JDBC, ReactJS, OracleSQL, MySQL, and the JXL library for Excel uploads; maintained clean code with SonarQube, resolved website issues, improved the UI, and optimized data fetching for 25% faster query response.

data.title: SDE Intern - Uolo
data.description: Developed API data logic for smooth JSON to structured data conversion, enhancing user experience in a Teaching and Learning app. Designed scalable UI for OTP and Ledger using Flutter and BLOC pattern, managing states and errors effectively. Resolved Web View data persistence issue using local storage, resulting in 5% higher user retention.
